exit(address,uint256).details: This function destroys the collateral representation from inside the system     and exits the collateral from this adapter. The adapter assumes that the collateral     has 18 decimals

params.account: Account to which we transfer the collateral
params.wad: Amount of collateral to transfer to 'account' (represented as a number with 18 decimals)*

join(address,uint256).details: This function locks collateral in the adapter and creates a 'representation' of     the locked collateral inside the system. This adapter assumes that the collateral     has 18 decimals

params.account: Account from which we transferFrom collateral and add it in the system
params.wad: Amount of collateral to transfer in the system (represented as a number with 18 decimals)*
